variable.description: Language code: en for English, ar for Arabic

response.name: Success Response

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Welcome to Baitak API",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "endpoints": {
    "auth": "/api/auth",
    "users": "/api/users",
    "providers": "/api/providers",
    "categories": "/api/categories",
    "services": "/api/services",
    "bookings": "/api/bookings",
    "ratings": "/api/ratings",
    "admin": "/api/admin",
    "search": "/api/search",
    "locations": "/api/locations"
  }
}

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Update booking status. When status is 'completed', you can optionally include:
- amount_paid: Actual amount paid by customer (defaults to total_price if not provided)
- provider_satisfaction: Provider's satisfaction rating with customer (1.0 to 5.0)

Example statuses: 'confirmed', 'provider_on_way', 'provider_arrived', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'cancelled'
